dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I couldn’t risk getting caught at this school doing such indecent things! I mean imagine the stories...

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: Takeshi-Kun, don’t worry so much! Besides isn’t the thrill of getting caught just a bit exciting?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: This girl is a pervert! She is just like that awful teacher!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: U-um...I don’t think that is the right attitude for a student to have Lucci-Chan...

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: Nonsense! Just let me make a phone call or two and we will see.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I tried to stop her, but Lucci was already on the phone, and then after a few minutes she came off in a real huff.

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: I’m sorry Takeshi-Kun, but apparently, we can’t do anything fun today, as my head-minion is taking a day off or something...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Her face was one of complete frustration...
